title: Who We Serve
intro: We work best where missions are complex, constraints are real, and outcomes must be measurable. Edit these cards to match the current Who We Serve copy you want to retain.

cards.title: Department of Defense
cards.body: Programs requiring secure AI, modernization, and execution under mission and compliance constraints.

cards.title: Department of Veterans Affairs
cards.body: Veteran-centric service delivery and operational improvement with measurable outcomes.

cards.title: Federal Agencies & Primes
cards.body: Teams operating in regulated environments, modernizing workflows and platforms safely.

cards.title: State & Local Government
cards.body: Citizen-facing modernization with governance, security, and workforce realities.

cards.title: Mission-Critical Operations
cards.body: Environments where reliability, uptime, and cyber posture are non-negotiable.

cards.title: Rural & Veteran Workforce Pipelines
cards.body: Workforce development and staffing aligned to federal initiatives and regional growth.
